msg: [SM-1573]add useSOAPEnvelope flag support for both cxf-se

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-1431 : Prevent listeners being added to _frameListeners when an exception state has occured due to connection closure. This adds additional synchronisation to the error handling condition. It also removes the need for a CopyOnWriteArrayList that was perhaps the wrong data structure for this list.
